article:
Tony and his friends found a strange old box and a treasure   map. They thought these _ be from Stickybeard, a famous Spanish pirate   who _ a lot of treasure in a secret place. They were very _ and started to look for the treasure.
They _ the map and found another small box. In the box, they found a few candies, the letter _ and another map. The new map led them to a big tree where they found another box with some candies, a new map, and a big letter O. They went on and found other _ boxes with the letters V and E. However, on the last map they found this was a puzzle  .
They spend a long time arguing about the meaning of the puzzle. _ , Alex, one of Tony's friends, found the answer, "The puzzle wants us to put the letters we have collected beside father and mother. Father and mother are our parents." He added, " _ the answer to the puzzle is ' love your parents'."
The great treasure Stickybeard left them was a great piece of _ --love your parents. From then on, Tony and his friends loved their parents more than ever.
